properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
1. S/V ZEN DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO STEERING GEAR
   FAILURE IN 15-54N 057-54W VESSELS IN VICINITY
   REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF
   POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
   INMARSAT-C: 4227 99024, TELEX: 42912008,
   PHONE: 59 659 670 9292, FAX: 59 659 663 2450,
   E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 111/13.
